Ella Vam Pire Tattooed Lady Bustier (Women)

Ella Vam Pire Tattooed Lady Bustier
kDesc
Ella is from an 'old money' family. VERY old money. Some say centuries. She's a modern girl herself, preferring gothic fashion to gothic crypts any day of the week. [#Legal]
Ella vient d'une "vieille" famille. TRÈS vieille. Certains disent même vieille de plusieurs siècles. C'est une fille moderne, qui préfère la mode gothique aux cryptes glauques. [#Legal]
Ella stammt aus einer alten Adelsfamilie. Wirklich SEHR alt! Manche sagen Jahrhunderte alt. Sie ist aber ein sehr modernes Mädel, das die Gotik-Modeviel schöner als Gotik-Gruften findet. [#Legal]
Ella proviene da una famiglia antica e benestante. MOLTO antica e benestante. Alcuni parlano di secoli. È una ragazza moderna e preferisce la moda gotica alle tombe gotiche. [#Legal]

Teresa proviene de una familia de abolengo cuyos orígenes se remontan a varios siglos en el pasado. No obstante, tiene un estilo moderno hasta el punto de preferir la moda gótica actual a las criptas góticas de antaño. [#Legal]
엘라는 '오래된 부자' 가문 출신입니다. 아주 오래된 부자이지요. 어떤 사람들은 수 백년을 이어 왔다고 얘기합니다. 그녀 자신은 현대적이어서, 주중 어떤 날에도 고딕풍 무덤보다는 현대적인 고딕풍의 패션을 선호한답니다. [#Legal]
Ella is from an 'old money' family. VERY old money. Some say centuries. She's a modern girl herself, preferring gothic fashion to gothic crypts any day of the week. [#Legal]
Ella來自歷史悠久的大戶人家，真的非常悠久。據說能追溯到數百年以前。不過她本人是現代女性，一年到頭都穿陰森詭異的服飾。 [#Legal]
Ella來自歷史悠久的大戶人家，真的非常悠久。據說能追溯到數百年以前。不過她本人是現代女性，一年到頭都穿陰森詭異的服飾。 [#Legal]
Ella is from an 'old money' family. VERY old money. Some say centuries. She's a modern girl herself, preferring gothic fashion to gothic crypts any day of the week. [#Legal]
